name: Hungry Piggy vs Chicken
description: Hungry piggy vs Chicken: Yes! We are Hungry! We all love the delicious eggs! Hungry piggy vs Chicken features hours of gameplay, challenging puzzles, and lots of replay value. Each level requires logic and skill to resolve.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP/Vista/Windows 7/Windows 8 Processor: 1 GHz or better Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 512MB Video Memory Storage: 512 MB available space Sound Card: 100% DirectX9.0c compatible sound card and drivers
